redstonemagic.oom: Not Enough Mana to Cast Spell...
advancements.devices.description: You hear you can craft a Redstone Block to make Redstone Magic Devices.
advancements.devices.gatherer.descriptio: A Gatherer infuses the chunk it is in with redstone mana.
advancements.devices.ritualpylon.descrip: Right click the Ritual Pylon with a tool, torch, or lantern to select the ritual when you have enough chunk mana.
advancements.falderals.description: You hear you can use Sympathetic Magic to modify Redstone Spells.
advancements.falderal.blueice.descriptio: Blue Ice changes a Redstone Bolt to an Ice Bolt.  Blazes fear it.
advancements.falderal.dragonegg.descript: Tho very powerful- No Use has been rediscovered yet.
advancements.falderal.feather.descriptio: A Feather makes Ancient Blessings cast Slow Falling.
advancements.falderal.fermentedspidereye: A Spider Eye Makes Ancient Blessings cast Invisibility.
advancements.falderal.firecharge.descrip: A Fire Charge changes a Redstone Bolt into a Fire Bolt.
advancements.falderal.ghasttear.descript: A Ghast Tear adds Flight to Redstone Bolts.
advancements.falderal.turtle_helmet.desc: A Turtle Helmet upgrades Crimson Cloud damage, slowness, and also increases duration.
advancements.falderal.glowstonedust.desc: A Glowstone Dust changes Scarlet Heal cast light if it has no target.
advancements.falderal.goldencarrot.descr: A Golden Carrot makes Ancient Blessings cast Night Vision even when it's not dark.  Also lasts longer.
advancements.falderal.magmacream.descrip: A Magma Cream makes Ancient Blessings cast Fire Resistance and increases duration.
advancements.falderal.milkbucket.descrip: A Milk Bucket allows Ancient Blessings remove one curse per cast.  It doesn't have to be on the hotbar and can be in normal inventory.
advancements.falderal.netherstar.descrip: A Netherstar increases the duration of all Ancient Blessings.
advancements.falderal.pufferfish.descrip: A Puffer Fish makes Ancient Blessings cast Water Breathing and extends duration.
advancements.falderal.spidereye.descript: A Spider Eye adds damage to Sepsis.
advancements.items.description: You can craft a Redstone Focus and you can upgrade Nether Armor to Redstone Armor.
advancements.items.redstonefocus.descrip: The Redstone Focus lets you cast spells.  It's most powerful in the off hand as a powerful shield but extras can be used from the hotbar.  You can cast spells with a short or long right click.
advancements.preparingspells.description: You can prepare spells by Sneaking And Right Clicking.  Go backwards or forwards thru your spell list by looking up or down when preparing a new spell.
advancements.reagents.description: Reagents must be in the hotbar and are destroyed to make spells more powerful.
advancements.reagent.redstone.descriptio: Redstone Dust is a reagent that adds damage to Redstone, Ice, and Fire Bolts.
advancements.rmroot.description: Start to learn Redstone Magic by mining some redstone dust.  Craft a book with a redstone dust.
